title: 🍐 "Openness may not completely disarm prejudice, but it's a good place to start." - Jason Collins
content:
Create a loooong teeeext generator that takes in a string and an integer n, and multiplies the vowels in the string by n.

Example:

$ longText('hello world', 3)
$ 'heeellooo wooorld'

$ longText('lol', 10)
$ 'looooooooool'
